Public.definition: exposed to general view [ indecency] b

sub_terms.b: known or recognized by many or most people

2 a.definition: of, relating to, or affecting all of the people or the whole area of a nation or state [ statutes]

sub_terms.b: of or relating to a governmentauthorized by, administered by, or acting for the people as a political entity [ expenditures] [the prosecutor]
sub_terms.c: of, relating to, or being in the service of the community or nation [holding office]
sub_terms.d: provided for, used by, or containing the records of a government agency [the post office and other buildings]

3.definition: of or relating to people in general

4.definition: of or relating to business or community interests as opposed to private affairs [ policy] [a matter of concern]

5.definition: devoted to the general or national welfare [actions motivated by spirit]

6.definition: accessible to or shared by all members of the community [a hearing] [a park] compare

7.definition: capitalized in shares that can be freely traded on the open market often used with

1.definition: a place accessible or visible to the public usually used in the phrase
